greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1 - x^2)^3 / ((1 - x)^3 * (1 - x^3)) in powers of x.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1).
formula: a(-n) = a(n) for all n in Z. a(n+3) = a(n) unless n=0 or n=-3. a(3*n) = 2 unless n=0. a(3*n + 1) = a(3*n + 2) = 3.
a(n) = A244893(n) if n>1. - _Michael Somos_, Apr 17 2015
mathematica: a[ n_] := -Boole[n == 0] + 2 + KroneckerSymbol[ 9, n]; (* _Michael Somos_, Apr 17 2015 *)
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Aug 13 2009
